resources.string: Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested

-----------------------------------
 Version 1.4.5
 -----------------------------------
 * Mp3 Download in 128Kbps, 192Kbps and 320Kbps added
 * 5 Band Equalizer added
 * Now stream audio in HIGH, MEDIUM and LOW Qualities
 * Playlist playback support both online and offline audio files
 * Crash report send function added
 * Bug fixes
 -----------------------------------
 Version 1.4
 ------------------------------------
 * Google assistant integration for media controls
 * Youtube API integrated for online streaming
 -----------------------------------
 Version 1.2
 -----------------------------------
 * Added add to favourite button
 * Added shuffle button
 * Background is now blurred with song embedded art
 * Implemented playing Queue and arranging items
 * Some minor bug fixes
 -----------------------------------
 Initial Version 1.0
 -----------------------------------
 * This is initial build, the basic music playing operations are included.
